languages.text: {n}Исповедник пожимает плечами, его добродушное лицо становится тверже.{/n} "К чему это? Если псы пришли в поисках крови, без добычи они не уйдут. Такова ваша хищная природа".
{n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."
languages.original_text: {n}Исповедник пожимает плечами, его добродушное лицо становится тверже.{/n} "К чему это? Если псы пришли в поисках крови, без добычи они не уйдут. Такова ваша хищная природа".

traits.locale_text: {n}The confessor shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why do you say this? If the dogs came looking for blood, they won't leave without a kill. Such is your predatory nature."

{n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert zuckt mit den Schultern, seine gütige Miene wird härter.{/n} "Wozu? Wenn die Hunde Blut wollen, werden sie erst abziehen, wenn sie es bekommen haben. So ist Eure grausame Natur."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert zuckt mit den Schultern, seine gütige Miene wird härter.{/n} "Wozu? Wenn die Hunde Blut wollen, werden sie erst abziehen, wenn sie es bekommen haben. So ist Eure grausame Natur."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert se encoge de hombros, y su expresión afable se torna más severa.{/n} «¿Y por qué iba a hacerlo? Si los perros vienen buscando sangre, no se marcharán sin una víctima. Así de cruel es su naturaleza.
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert se encoge de hombros, y su expresión afable se torna más severa.{/n} «¿Y por qué iba a hacerlo? Si los perros vienen buscando sangre, no se marcharán sin una víctima. Así de cruel es su naturaleza.

languages.text: {n}アダルバートは肩をすくめ、その優しげな表情はグッと硬くなった。{/n}「なぜ私が？犬が血を求めてやってきたのなら、殺さず立ち去ることはない。それが君達狂人の性格だろう」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートは肩をすくめ、その優しげな表情はグッと硬くなった。{/n}「なぜ私が？犬が血を求めてやってきたのなら、殺さず立ち去ることはない。それが君達狂人の性格だろう」

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特耸了耸肩，原本和蔼可亲的脸变得更加冷硬。{/n}“我为什么要狡辩呢？既然猎犬想要见血，那它们不杀死猎物就不会离开，这就是你恶毒的本性。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特耸了耸肩，原本和蔼可亲的脸变得更加冷硬。{/n}“我为什么要狡辩呢？既然猎犬想要见血，那它们不杀死猎物就不会离开，这就是你恶毒的本性。”

languages.text: {n}Adalbert hausse les épaules, et ses traits avenants se durcissent.{/n} « À quoi bon ? Quand sonne l'hallali, les molosses assoiffés de sang ne renoncent pas avant d'avoir tué leur proie. Telle est votre nature bestiale. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert hausse les épaules, et ses traits avenants se durcissent.{/n} « À quoi bon ? Quand sonne l'hallali, les molosses assoiffés de sang ne renoncent pas avant d'avoir tué leur proie. Telle est votre nature bestiale. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert omuz silkiyor. Nazik yüzü giderek sertleşiyor.{/n} "Neden söyleyeyim ki? Eğer köpekler kan dökmeye gelmişse kimseyi öldürmeden gitmezler. Senin vahşi tabiatın böyle."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shrugs, his kindly face growing harder.{/n} "Why would I? If the dogs have come looking for blood, they will not leave without a kill. Such is your vicious nature."
